commits.author: Robert Muir
commits.sourceNew: /** * Performs a lookup by value. * * @param value * the value to look up * @param spare * a spare {@link BytesRef} instance used to compare internal * values to the given value. Must not be null * @return the given values ordinal if found or otherwise * (-(ord)-1), defined as the ordinal of the first * element that is greater than the given value. This guarantees * that the return value will always be >= 0 if the given value * is found. */ public int getByValue(BytesRef value, BytesRef spare) { return binarySearch(value, spare, 0, getValueCount() - 1); }
commits.sourceOld: /** * Performs a lookup by value. * * @param value * the value to look up * @param spare * a spare {@link BytesRef} instance used to compare internal * values to the given value. Must not be null * @return the given values ordinal if found or otherwise * (-(ord)-1), defined as the ordinal of the first * element that is greater than the given value. This guarantees * that the return value will always be >= 0 if the given value * is found. */ public int getByValue(BytesRef value, BytesRef spare) { return binarySearch(value, spare, 0, getValueCount() - 1); }
